head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HIMELSTEIN, LIBBY R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HIMELSTEIN, LIBBY R.

block.p: HIMELSTEIN-Libby R. (nee Rosenfeld). On November 11, 1998 of Garden City, LI. Beloved wife of Morgan. Devoted mother of Dr. Andrew and Dr. Rima, Dr. Bruce and Dr. Nita. Dear sister of Robert Rosenfeld. Cherished grandmother of Daniel, Robyn, Rebecca, Jeffrey and Miriam. Services today 12:15 PM at ''Gutterman's, Inc.'', 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, Long Island.

HIMELSTEIN-Libby R. (nee Rosenfeld). On November 11, 1998 of Garden City, LI. Beloved wife of Morgan. Devoted mother of Dr. Andrew and Dr. Rima, Dr. Bruce and Dr. Nita. Dear sister of Robert Rosenfeld. Cherished grandmother of Daniel, Robyn, Rebecca, Jeffrey and Miriam. Services today 12:15 PM at ''Gutterman's, Inc.'', 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, Long Island.
